mapper.insert: INSERT INTO import_request(uuid, file_name, status_id, creation_time, last_update_time, created_by) VALUES (#{request.uuid}, #{request.fileName}, #{request.status.id}, #{now}, #{now}, #{request.createdBy})
INSERT INTO import_errors(request_uuid, colleague_uuid, code, message) VALUES (#{error.requestUuid}, #{error.colleagueUuid}, #{error.code}, #{error.message})
mapper.select: SELECT request_uuid as requestUuid, colleague_uuid as colleagueUuid, code, message FROM import_errors WHERE request_uuid = #{uuid}
